feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: Graphiti supports the fast and easy creation of unified graphical tools, which can graphically display and edit underlying domain models using a tool-defined notation. This is the full blown SDK feature containing the framework itself plus the source code, documentation and examples with their source code.
